Beehive plugin for TinyMCE
--------------------------

About:
  This plugin adds toolbar icons for the following Beehive features:
   - the <quote> tag
   - the <code> tag
   - the <spoiler> tag
   - the <noemots> tag
   - the spell checker

Installation instructions:
  * Copy the 'beehive' directory to the plugins directory of TinyMCE (/tiny_mce/plugins).
